text: Blue Seduction is a 2009 Canadian thriller movie. It was directed by Timothy Bond and written by Jacqueline Giroux. == Plot == A middle aged lyricist get caught in a seduction game. This is by an attractive young female singer who wants her "fifteen minutes of fame".Synopsis on Artist direct , artisdirect.com. == Cast == * Billy Zane as Mikey Taylor * Estella Warren as Matty * Jane Wheeler as Joyce * Bernard Robichaud as Stanley == References == == Other websites== * Category:2009 thriller movies Category:Canadian thriller movies Category:Television movies
title: Blue Seduction
